summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 26
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Thursday, with 13 gaining and 5 declining.
Bitcoin rose 0.9% to $23,131 by market close.
